description:
Лаптоп
Дисплеј:15.6" (39.6cm)
Резолуција:(1920x1080) FHD, IPS, 300nits Anti-glare
Чипсет: AMD SoC Platform
Процесор: AMD Ryzen™ 7 7730U (8C / 16T, 2.0 / 4.5GHz, 4MB L2 / 16MB L3)
Графика:Integrated AMD Radeon™ Graphics
RAM Меморија: 16GB DDR4-3200
Диск (Storage): 512GB SSD M.2 2242 PCIe® 4.0x4 NVMe®
Порти:
2x USB 3.2 Gen 1
1x USB-C® 3.2 Gen 1 (support data transfer, Power Delivery and DisplayPort™ 1.2)
1x HDMI® 1.4
1x Card reader
1x Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm)
1x Power connector
Без оперативен систем
Аудио:High Definition (HD) Audio
Звучник:Stereo speakers, 1.5W x2, optimized with Dolby® Audio™
Камера:FHD 1080p with Privacy Shutter
Микрофон:2x, Array
Wireless: Wi-Fi® 6, 11ax 2x2
Bluetooth: 5.1
Батерија: 47Wh, 10 hr
Полнач: 65W Round Tip (3-pin)
